title: The Grinder
description: Lawyer Mitch Grinder of Stutz & Grinder grinds hard for his clients. There’s no one he can’t get off.
quote: Everyone knows how hard I grind. But what they don’t know… is that you grind even harder behind me.
altHero: Mitch Grinder questioning a witness in court
alt1: Grinder in front of a large evidence board
alt2: Grinder speaking with a woman in a hospital bed
alt3: Grinder with long hair by a beach hut, another man in a disheveled suit holds a gun
alt4: Grinder wearing a barrister’s robe and wig
